title: Is the new monster hunter Jinx a legacy skin?
body:
Is the new monster hunter Jinx a legacy skin?

Please tell me soon I need to take this under consideration before I buy it!

Thank You,
Matto2324

replies.body: Yes they are for the halloween event, The Harrowing, They will be available for a limited time, but will be back on sale in 2016.
Slayer Jinx, Slayer Pantheon and Zombie Nunu will all be legacy.
